meanings.definition: Convert (data or images) into digital form.
meanings.sent1: I digitalized my old photos to save them on my computer.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to digitalize their records for easier access.
meanings.sent3: After I digitalized my notes, I felt like a tech wizard!
meanings.sent4: She digitalized her memories, turning them into pixels of the past.
meanings.sent5: The process of digitalizing the documents was quick and efficient.

meanings.sent1: We digitalized the manual system to streamline our operations.
meanings.sent2: The library digitalized their catalog for online browsing.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally digitalized my shopping list and now it's on my phone!
meanings.sent4: His mind digitalized the information, organizing it like a computer.
meanings.sent5: The artist digitalized his artwork, bringing it into the modern age.
